question: 今月
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>月</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Only <vocabulary>this month</vocabulary>, your pet <reading>con</reading>dor <reading>gets</reading> (<ja>こんげつ</ja>) to sleep in your bed. You usually keep it in a cage, but once a year, you make an exception. And that's this month. How cute!
